PERSON & PLACE

I gave up on art after graduating with an art degree. This is my project to get back to creating for its own beautiful sake. I make no claims that this work is "good" or "original" just that it comes from me and that I want it to be in the world. Art straight to your inbox.

Be awesome: Subscribe now for your weekly fix.
No spam; I swear.
